DOC.brief_summary: The first part pilot study , detailed Unique Protocol ID No . 27522 , randomize clinical trial compare effect mind-body bridge program sleep hygiene program improve sleep quality patient suffer sleep disturbance . In Part II study , investigator perform six month follow-up subject .
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Study Examining Sleep Management United States Veterans
DOC.detailed_description: In follow-up , ask subject answer questionnaire complete begin study . In addition ask subject complete survey reflect medical history past 6 month second survey establish behavioral pattern whether continued practice technique intervention assign .
DOC.criteria: Have participate Part I study The patient present significant mental health issue , severe psychosis major depression ( verified primary care provider ) patient intensive mental health case management .
